Dialogue.Value: I never NetBattle，so I can’t,win against the viruses....
You all are so amazing!,I couldn’t help at all....
You students are better at,dealing with high-tech things,like this than we are.
Of all the times for Ms. Asakura,to be on a business trip....
I don’t have a NetNavi，so I,can only stand by and watch....
Teachers have to come to,school even when the,students are on break.
However，we get to go home,earlier than usual.
Hurry，Alice! Jack in!
This computer is much bigger,than the one in the classroom!
It’s the Staff Room’s server.
It’s full of school data that the,teachers use.
Of course，I can jack in!
It’s a file cabinet for teachers’,business documents.
They’ll get mad if I take a,peek，so I’ll leave it alone.
It’s a file cabinet for teachers’,business documents.
They’ll get mad if I take a,peek，so I’ll leave it alone.
It’s a file cabinet for teachers’,business documents.
They’ll get mad if I take a,peek，so I’ll leave it alone.
It’s a file cabinet for teachers’,business documents.
They’ll get mad if I take a,peek，so I’ll leave it alone.
It’s an especially normal,houseplant.
There’s still water on the,leaves，so it must’ve been,watered recently.
A bottle of fertilizer has,”37854695” written on it.
It’s a desk that teachers use.
Since all of the class materials,are digitized，the desk is quite,tidy.
It’s a desk that teachers use.
Since all of the class materials,are digitized，the desk is quite,tidy.
It’s a desk that teachers use.
Since all of the class materials,are digitized，the desk is quite,tidy.
It’s a desk that teachers use.
Since all of the class materials,are digitized，the desk is quite,tidy.
It’s a desk that teachers use.
Since all of the class materials,are digitized，the desk is quite,tidy.
I heard about what happened,with Ms. Asakura.
We all only saw the good,person that she kept locked,away while she did evil.
You can’t blame yourself for,anything that happened.,Nobody could have known.
Now that Ms. Asakura’s gone，,we need to get another teacher,who knows computers....
Us old folks just don’t get these,dang machines.
